definition: Garden of Gethsemane (in the Christian passion story)
pinyin: Ke4 xi1 ma3 ni2 hua1 yuan2

definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
